languages.text: {n}Джай отвечает на поцелуй с охотой и страстью.{/n} "Ты стал{mf||а} для меня очень особенн{mf|ым другом|ой подругой}, шерин. Постарайся не умереть в этой экспедиции. Не хочу о тебе плакать".
{n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай отвечает на поцелуй с охотой и страстью.{/n} "Ты стал{mf||а} для меня очень особенн{mf|ым другом|ой подругой}, шерин. Постарайся не умереть в этой экспедиции. Не хочу о тебе плакать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaei responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to be mourning for you."
{n}Jaei responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to be mourning for you."
{n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."
{n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."
{n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

languages.text: {n}婕伊热情而渴切地回应着你的吻。{/n}“你已经成了我非常特别的朋友，亲爱的。尽量别死在这场探险中，我可不想为你放声大哭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊热情而渴切地回应着你的吻。{/n}“你已经成了我非常特别的朋友，亲爱的。尽量别死在这场探险中，我可不想为你放声大哭。”

languages.text: {n}Jae responde al beso con pasión y entusiasmo.{/n} «Te has convertido en un{mf||a} amig{mf|o|a} muy especial para mí, shereen. Intenta no morir en esta expedición. Preferiría no tener que llorar por ti».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae responde al beso con pasión y entusiasmo.{/n} «Te has convertido en un{mf||a} amig{mf|o|a} muy especial para mí, shereen. Intenta no morir en esta expedición. Preferiría no tener que llorar por ti».

languages.text: {n}ジェイはむさぼるように、情熱的にキスに応じる。{/n}「あんたはあたしの特別な友になったのよ、シャリーン。この遠征で命を落とすなんてやめてちょうだい。あんたのために悲しみの涙なんか流したくはないんだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはむさぼるように、情熱的にキスに応じる。{/n}「あんたはあたしの特別な友になったのよ、シャリーン。この遠征で命を落とすなんてやめてちょうだい。あんたのために悲しみの涙なんか流したくはないんだから」

languages.text: {n}Jae reagiert begierig und leidenschaftlich auf den Kuss.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|mein ganz spezieller Freund|meine ganz spezielle Freundin} geworden, Shereen. Versucht bitte, auf dieser Expedition nicht zu sterben. Ich möchte Euch nicht beweinen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae reagiert begierig und leidenschaftlich auf den Kuss.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|mein ganz spezieller Freund|meine ganz spezielle Freundin} geworden, Shereen. Versucht bitte, auf dieser Expedition nicht zu sterben. Ich möchte Euch nicht beweinen."

languages.text: {n}Jae vous rend votre baiser avec ardeur et passion.{/n} « Vous êtes particulièrement {mf|cher|chère} à mon cœur, shereen. Tâchez de ne pas mourir au cours de cette expédition. Je n'ai aucune envie de porter votre deuil. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae vous rend votre baiser avec ardeur et passion.{/n} « Vous êtes particulièrement {mf|cher|chère} à mon cœur, shereen. Tâchez de ne pas mourir au cours de cette expédition. Je n'ai aucune envie de porter votre deuil. »

languages.text: {n}Jae, öpücüğe hevesle ve tutkuyla karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Benim en özel arkadaşım oldun şirinim. Bugün burada öleyim deme. Arkandan gözyaşı dökmek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds to the kiss with eagerness and passion.{/n} "You have become my very special friend, shereen. Try not to die on this expedition. I do not wish to weep over you."
